description: This table contains the system Master Person Index ID numbers for your Plan of Care. Each Plan of Care may have multiple Master Person Index IDs. A line number is used to identify each identification number for a Plan of Care.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ID type of the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier.

columns.name: MPI_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The date the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier is effective from.

columns.name: MPI_TO_DATE
columns.description: The date the Master Patient Index (MPI) identifier is effective until.
